message: ...When I open my eyes, all I see is the ceiling.
My room...
I blink a few times, and slowly, reality sets in.
My head is pounding.
I need my medicine.
Propping myself up on my arms, I see Ren curled up on the edge of the bed.
The sight is powerfully familiar. Everything is exactly where it's always been.
I'm home.
I reach out and stroke Ren's head before starting him up.

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Good morning, Ren."

name: 蓮
message: "Good morning. How are you feeling?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "My head is killing me."

name: 蓮
message: "I see. You ought to take your medicine."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. Let's head downstairs."
I get out of bed and pick Ren up, then go out into the hallway.
Owwww...
I feel awful, like every step I take is echoing inside my skull.
But when I catch a whiff of the smell wafting up the stairs, I forget the pain for a moment.
It's the smell of Granny's cooking.
...Granny. I'm so glad you're safe.
I head downstairs, grateful that I can still feel hunger.
